com.github.nodamushi.common.paths

クラス NPaths

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nodamushi.common.paths.NPaths

  • public class NPaths
extends Object
    nodamushi path utilities.
    バージョン:
    1.0.0
    作成者:
    nodamushi

      static class  NPaths.ItrOption
      Path Iterator Option.
      static interface  NPaths.Visit
      called from FileVisitor.visitFile(Object, BasicFileAttributes) or FileVisitor.preVisitDirectory(Object, BasicFileAttributes).

      • get

        public static Path get(FileSystem fileSystem,
                       String first,
                       String... more)
        FileSystem.getPath(String, String...)
        パラメータ:
        fileSystem - nullable.
        first - nullable.if first is null,an empty string is used.
        more - nullable.more path
        戻り値:
        if fileSystem is null,return Paths.get(first,more...)
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0
        関連項目:
        FileSystem.getPath(String, String...)

      • relativize

        public static Path relativize(Path basePath,
                              Path path)
                       throws NullPointerException
        get a relative path. If roots of basePath and path are different,return path.toAbsolutePath().
        • "a/b/c" , "a/c/d" → "../../c/d"
        • "C:/a/b", "C:/a/c" → "../c"
        • "C:/a/b", "D:/a/c" → "D:/a/c"
        • "a/b", "D:/a/c" → "D:/a/c" (* the root of the current work directory is NOT D:)
        • "a/b", "D:/a/c" → relative from "{current work directory}/a/b" (* the root of the current work directory is D:)
        パラメータ:
        basePath - base path.non null.
        path - path.non null
        戻り値:
        relative path from basePath.
        例外:
        NullPointerException - arguments are null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getParent

        public static Path getParent(Path path)
                      throws NullPointerException
        get a parent of path. if path has no parent,return an empty path.(never return null)
        パラメータ:
        path - path.non null.
        戻り値:
        parent.getParent() or path.getFileSystem().getPath("").
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

                           Path path)
                    throws NullPointerException
        get parent/path
        パラメータ:
        parent - nullable
        path - non null
        戻り値:
        parent/path. If path is an absolute path,return path.
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:

      • resolve

        public static Path resolve(Path parent,
                           String path)
                    throws NullPointerException
        get parent/path
        パラメータ:
        parent - nullable
        path - non null
        戻り値:
        parent/path.If path is an absolute path,return path. When parent is null,the FileSystem of the returned path is FileSystems.getDefault().
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(Path path)
                          throws NullPointerException
        get string of the file name of the path.
        • "test.txt" → "test.txt"
        • "a/b/c/test.txt" → "test.txt"
        • "/" → ""
        • "C:/" → ""
        • "." → "."
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        戻り値:
        path.getFileName().toString()
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(Path path)
                           throws NullPointerException
        get the file extension.
        • "C:/test.txt" → "txt"
        • "abc.tar.gz" → "gz"
        • "abc." → ""
        • "/" → ""
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        戻り値:
        file extension
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(Path path,
                                  int dotCount,
                                  boolean fuzzy)
                           throws NullPointerException
        get the file extension.
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",1 → "gz"
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",2 → "tar.gz"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "b.c.d.e"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method returns the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → ""
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → ""

        fuzzy = true:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "b.c.d.e"
        戻り値:
        file extension
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(Path path,
                                  int dotCount)
                           throws NullPointerException
        get the file extension.
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",1 → "gz"
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",2 → "tar.gz"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → ""
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method returns the longest extension.
        戻り値:
        file extension
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0
        関連項目:
        getExtension(Path, int, boolean)

        public static String getNameWithoutExtension(Path path)
                                      throws NullPointerException

        • "abc." → "abc"

      • getNameWithoutExtension

        public static String getNameWithoutExtension(Path path,
                                             int dotCount,
                                             boolean fuzzy)
                                      throws NullPointerException
        get the file name without the extension.
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",1 → "a.tar"
        • "/dir/a.tar.gz",2 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "a"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method removes the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "a.b.c.d"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "a.b.c"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "a.b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "a.b.c.d.e"

        fuzzy = true:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "a.b.c.d"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "a.b.c"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "a"
        戻り値:
        file extension
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • getNameWithoutExtension

        public static String getNameWithoutExtension(Path path,
                                             int dotCount)
                                      throws NullPointerException
        get the file name without the extension.
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "a"

        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "a.b.c"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "a.b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "a.b.c.d.e"

        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method removes the longest extension.
        戻り値:
        file extension
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:

      • removeExtension

        public static Path removeExtension(Path path)
                            throws NullPointerException
        get the path without the extension.
        • "C:/a/test.txt" → "C:/a/test"
        • "abc.tar.gz" → "abc.tar"
        • "abc." → "abc"
        • "." → ""
        • ".." → "."
        • "/" → "/"
        • "C:/" → "C:/"
        • "" → ""
        パラメータ:
        path - non null
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • removeExtension

        public static Path removeExtension(Path path,
                                   int dotCount)
                            throws NullPointerException
        get the path without the extension.
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 0 → "/a/b/c"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 1 → "/a/b/c.d.e"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 2 → "/a/b/c.d"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 3 → "/a/b/c"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 4 → "/a/b/c.d.e.f"
        • "/" n → "/"
        • "C:/" n → "C:/"
        • "" n → ""
        パラメータ:
        path - non null
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method removes the longest extension.
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0
        関連項目:
        getExtension(Path, int, boolean)

      • removeExtension

        public static Path removeExtension(Path path,
                                   int dotCount,
                                   boolean fuzzy)
                            throws NullPointerException
        get the path without the extension.
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 0 → "/a/b/c"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 1 → "/a/b/c.d.e"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 2 → "/a/b/c.d"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 3 → "/a/b/c"
        • "/a/b/c.d.e.f" 4 → "/a/b/c.d.e.f"
        • "/" n → "/"
        • "C:/" n → "C:/"
        • "" n → ""
        パラメータ:
        path - non null
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method removes the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "/dir/a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "/dir/a.b.c.d"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "/dir/a.b.c"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "/dir/a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "/dir/a.b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "/dir/a.b.c.d.e"

        fuzzy = true:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → "/dir/a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → "/dir/a.b.c.d"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → "/dir/a.b.c"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → "/dir/a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → "/dir/a"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → "/dir/a"
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0
        関連項目:
        getExtension(Path, int, boolean)

      • newFileName

        public static Path newFileName(Path path,
                               String pre,
                               String insert,
                               String ext,
                               String post,
                               int dotCount,
                               boolean fuzzy)
                        throws NullPointerException
        create a new path. "DIR/FILENAME.EXTENSION" → "DIR/<pre>FILENAME<insert>.<ext><post>"
        When the ext is null,"DIR/FILENAME.EXTENSION" → "DIR/<pre>FILENAME<insert>.EXTENSION<post>"
        When the ext is empty, "DIR/FILENAME.EXTENSION" → "DIR/<pre>FILENAME<insert><post>"
        • "/NAME.TXT","pre_","_ins","org","_post",1 →"/pre_NAME_ins.org_post"
        • "NAME.TXT","pre_","_ins",null,"_post",1 →"pre_NAME_ins.TXT_post"
        • "NAME.TXT","pre_","_ins","","_post",1 →"pre_NAME_ins_post"
        • "/a/b.c.d.e.f","pre_","_ins","txt","_post",0 →"/a/pre_b_ins.txt_post"
        • "/a/b.c.d.e.f","pre_","_ins","txt","_post",2 →"/a/pre_b.c.d_ins.txt_post"
        • "/","pre_","_ins","txt","_post",0 →"/pre__ins.txt_post"
        • "C:/","pre_","_ins","txt","_post",0 →"C:/pre__ins.txt_post"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        pre - nullable
        insert - nullabel
        ext - extension.If ext is null,the original extension of path is used.
        post - nullable.
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method uses the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." of the extension is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = ""
        • "a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = ""

        fuzzy = true:
        • "a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        戻り値:
        new path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • replaceExtension

        public static Path replaceExtension(Path path,
                                    String ext)
                             throws NullPointerException
        Returns the path that changed the extension of the file name of path. If path has no extension,simply add the extension.
        • "/test.txt","org" → "/test.org"
        • "test.txt",".org" → "test.org"
        • "/test",".org" → "/test.org"
        • "/test.txt","" → "/test"
        • "/test.txt",null → "/test"
        • "/",".org" → "/.org"
        • "","org" → ".org"
        • ".","org" → ".org"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        ext - extension.(Either ".txt" or "txt" is possible.).nullable
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • replaceExtension

        public static Path replaceExtension(Path path,
                                    String ext,
                                    int dotCount)
                             throws NullPointerException
        Returns the path that changed the extension of the file name of path. If path has no extension,simply add the extension.
        • "/test.txt","org",1 → "/test.org"
        • "test.tar.gz",".org",1 → "test.tar.org"
        • "test.tar.gz",".org",2 → "test.org"
        • "/a.b.c.d.e",".org",0 → "/a.org"
        • "/test.txt","",0 → "/test"
        • "/test.txt",null,0 → "/test"
        • "/",".org",0 → "/.org"
        • "","org",0 → ".org"
        • ".","org",0 → ".org"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        ext - extension.(Either ".txt" or "txt" is possible.).nullable
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method uses the longest extension.
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • replaceExtension

        public static Path replaceExtension(Path path,
                                    String ext,
                                    int dotCount,
                                    boolean fuzzy)
                             throws NullPointerException
        Returns the path that changed the extension of the file name of path. If path has no extension,simply add the extension.
        • "/test.txt","org",1 → "/test.org"
        • "test.tar.gz",".org",1 → "test.tar.org"
        • "test.tar.gz",".org",2 → "test.org"
        • "/a.b.c.d.e",".org",0 → "/a.org"
        • "/test.txt","",0 → "/test"
        • "/test.txt",null,0 → "/test"
        • "/",".org",0 → "/.org"
        • "","org",0 → ".org"
        • ".","org",0 → ".org"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        ext - extension.(Either ".txt" or "txt" is possible.).nullable
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method uses the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." of the extension is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = ""
        • "a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = ""

        fuzzy = true:
        • "a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • prependFileName

        public static Path prependFileName(Path path,
                                   String str)
                            throws NullPointerException
        add str to the file name of path.
        • "a/b/c/test.txt","str_" → "a/b/c/str_test.txt"
        • ".","str_" → "str_."
        • "/","str_" → "/str_"
        • "/a/b/","str_" → "/a/str_b"
        • "C:/","str_" → "C:/str_"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        str - append string
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • appendFileName

        public static Path appendFileName(Path path,
                                  String str)
        add str to the file name of path.
        • "a/b/c/test.txt","_str" → "a/b/c/test.txt_str"
        • ".","_str" → "._str"
        • "/","_str" → "/_str"
        • "/a/b/","_str" → "/a/b_str"
        • "C:/","_str" → "C:/_str"
        パラメータ:
        path - non null.
        str - append string
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • insertFileName

        public static Path insertFileName(Path path,
                                  String str,
                                  int dotCount,
                                  boolean fuzzy)
                           throws NullPointerException
        insert str before the extension of path.
        • "a/b/c/test.txt","_str" → "a/b/c/test_str.txt"
        • "a/b/c/test","_str" → "a/b/c/test_str"
        • ".","_str" → "_str."
        • "/","_str" → "/_str"
        • "/a/b/","_str" → "/a/b_str"
        • "C:/","_str" → "C:/_str"
        パラメータ:
        path - path
        str - insert text
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method uses the longest extension.
        fuzzy - if true,the count of the number of "." of the extension is fuzzy.
        fuzzy = false:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = ""
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = ""

        fuzzy = true:
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",0 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",1 → extension = "e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",2 → extension = "d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",4 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",5 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        • "/dir/a.b.c.d.e",10 → extension = "b.c.d.e"
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • insertFileName

        public static Path insertFileName(Path path,
                                  String str,
                                  int dotCount)
                           throws NullPointerException
        insert str before the extension of path.
        • "a/b/c/test.txt","_str" , 1 → "a/b/c/test_str.txt"
        • "a/b/c/test.tar.gz","_str" , 2 → "a/b/c/test_str.tar.gz"
        • "a/b/c/test.tar.gz","_str" , 3 → "a/b/c/test.tar.gz_str"
        • "a/b/c/test.a.b.c.d.e","_str" , 0 → "a/b/c/test_str.a.b.c.d.e"
        • "a/b/c/test","_str" , 1 → "a/b/c/test_str"
        • ".","_str" , 1 → "_str."
        • "/","_str" , 1 → "/_str"
        • "/a/b/","_str" , 1 → "/a/b_str"
        • "C:/","_str" , 1 → "C:/_str"
        パラメータ:
        path - path
        str - insert text
        dotCount - the number of dots appear in the extension. If dotCount is less than or equal to 0,this method uses the longest extension.
        戻り値:
        path
        例外:
        NullPointerException - path is null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • newBufferedReader

        public static BufferedReader newBufferedReader(Path path,
                                               Charset charset,
                                               OpenOption... options)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               NullPointerException
        Open the file and create a new BufferedReader. When charset is UTF-8/UTF-16/UTF-16BE/UTF-16LE and the BOM is found,the reader will skip the BOM.
        パラメータ:
        path - file paht.non null.
        charset - if charset is null,Charset.defaultCharset() will be used.
        options - options
        戻り値:
        BufferedReader
        例外:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        NullPointerException - path is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • newBufferedReader

        public static BufferedReader newBufferedReader(InputStream inputStream,
                                               Charset charset)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               NullPointerException
        wrap input with a BufferedReader. When charset is UTF-8/UTF-16/UTF-16BE/UTF-16LE and the BOM is found,the reader will skip the BOM.
        パラメータ:
        inputStream - input
        charset - if charset is null,Charset.defaultCharset() will be used.
        戻り値:
        BufferedReader
        例外:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        NullPointerException - inputStream is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • walkFiles

        public static void walkFiles(Path start,
                             int directoryMaxDepth,
                             NPaths.Visit visitFile)
                      throws IOException
        only implements FileVisitor.visitFile(Object, BasicFileAttributes),and call Files.walkFileTree(Path, FileVisitor).
        パラメータ:
        start - start path
        directoryMaxDepth - Max depth of the directory access.If directoryMaxDepth is less than 0, it is considered to be unlimited.
        visitFile - called from FileVisitor.visitFile(Object, BasicFileAttributes)
        例外:
        IOException - I/O exception occur.
        NullPointerException - path , visitFile are null
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • iterator

        public static Iterable<Path> iterator(Path path,
                                      int startIndex,
                                      NPaths.ItrOption option)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        create path Iterable
        パラメータ:
        path - path.if path is null,this function return empty Iterable(not return null).
        startIndex - first index of iterator.(* greater than or equal to 0.)
        option - iterator type.if option is null, NPaths.ItrOption.FULL_PATH is used.
        戻り値:
        Iterable
        例外:
        IllegalArgumentException - startIndex < 0
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0

      • forEach

        public static void forEach(Path path,
                           int startIndex,
                           NPaths.ItrOption option,
                           Consumer<Path> func)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException
        for(Path p:itarator(path,startIndex,option)) func.accept(p);
        パラメータ:
        path - path
        startIndex - startIndex
        option - option.
        func - called function for each path.if func is null, this method do nothing.
        例外:
        IllegalArgumentException - startIndex < 0.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.0.0
        関連項目:
        iterator(Path, int, ItrOption)
